description: Allows the mob to alert mobs in nearby blocks to come out.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Silverfish Wake Up Friends Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the mob to alert mobs in nearby blocks to come out. Currently it can only be used by Silverfish.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
